sentences.english: Lesser quality stones have been used in quantities in ornamental gardens and as aquarium stones.
sentences.chinese: 小部分的雨花石已被用于花园装饰和水族馆用石。

sentences.english: Chrysanthemum stone is a natural in the geological "Flora".
sentences.chinese: 菊花石是地质中的一种天然“花卉”。

sentences.english: The first-class Yu-hua-shi is a kind of agate.
sentences.chinese: 上等的雨花石是一种玛瑙。
那边有个雨花石博物馆。

sentences.english: Chrysanthemum stone is an ornamental stone unique to China.
sentences.chinese: 菊花石是我国特有的一种观赏石。

sentences.english: The son should refuse to take a pebble.
sentences.chinese: 儿子应该拒绝选取鹅花石。
